mapper.insert: insert into VIDEOS (THUMBNAIL, TITLE, TYPE1, TYPE2, TYPE3, COUNT, URL) values (#{thumbnail}, #{title}, #{type1}, #{type2}, #{type3}, 0, #{url})
mapper.select: select * from VIDEOS order by `COUNT` LIMIT 10 OFFSET 0
mapper.update: update VIDEOS set THUMBNAIL = #{thumbnail}, TITLE = #{title}, TYPE1 = #{type1}, TYPE2 = #{type2}, TYPE3 = #{type3}, COUNT = #{count}, URL = #{url} where ID = #{id}
